description.p: The velociraptor is a feathered dinosaur that resembles a large turkey. It has a long, slender snout, sharp teeth, and a curved claw on each hind foot. It is covered in brown and black feathers, with a distinctive crest on its head. It has a long, stiff tail that helps it balance and maneuver. It is about 2 feet tall and 6 feet long, and weighs about 30 pounds.

The velociraptor is an aggressive predator that often hunts in packs. It uses its speed and cunning to ambush and surround its prey. It has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is not incapacitated. It can make two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. Its bite can pierce through flesh and bone, while its claws can slash and rend. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, the velociraptor can try to grapple it with its bite and drag it away.
